executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse cursor horizontally while dodging asteroids and UFOs falling from the top of the screen. Players collect stars for points (50 each) with game speed increasing every 10 seconds. Game ends immediately upon collision with bad objects.

tasks.description: Create HTML structure and basic styling
tasks.requirements: Set up the main HTML file with canvas element for game rendering, basic CSS styling for space theme, and responsive design
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads properly, canvas is visible and properly sized, basic space-themed styling is applied

tasks.description: Initialize game canvas and rendering system
tasks.requirements: Set up HTML5 canvas context, implement basic rendering loop with requestAnimationFrame, establish coordinate system and screen boundaries
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas initializes properly, rendering loop runs smoothly at 60fps, coordinate system works correctly

tasks.requirements: Create player object with rocket emoji (🚀), implement horizontal mouse-following movement, constrain movement to screen boundaries
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket appears on screen, follows mouse cursor horizontally only, stays within screen bounds

tasks.requirements: Implement object spawning system that creates asteroids (☄️), UFOs (🛸), and stars (⭐) at random positions at top of screen, make objects fall downward at high speed
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly at top, fall downward at appropriate speed, despawn when off-screen

tasks.requirements: Create collision detection between player rocket and all falling objects, distinguish between good items (stars) and bad items (asteroids, UFOs)
tasks.test_criteria: Collisions are detected accurately, different object types trigger appropriate responses

tasks.requirements: Add score tracking that increases by 50 points when collecting stars, display current score on screen
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when star is collected, score is displayed and updates in real-time

tasks.requirements: Trigger immediate game over when player touches asteroid or UFO, display game over screen with final score
tasks.test_criteria: Game ends immediately upon collision with bad objects, game over screen shows with final score

tasks.requirements: Increase game speed every 10 seconds by making objects fall faster and spawn more frequently
tasks.test_criteria: Game speed noticeably increases every 10 seconds, difficulty progression is smooth and challenging

tasks.requirements: Implement start screen, game loop, and restart functionality after game over
tasks.test_criteria: Game has proper start screen, can be restarted after game over, state transitions work smoothly

tasks.requirements: Optimize rendering performance, add visual feedback for collisions, ensure smooth gameplay across different devices
tasks.test_criteria: Game runs smoothly on various devices, no performance issues, visual feedback is clear and responsive

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML entry point, CSS styling, and JavaScript game logic
